snippet: Now that Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is in hot water over the bridge scandal, Barbara Buono, his rival in the 2013 election, said Democrats who didn’t support her are regretting it.
abstract: Barbara Buono, New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's rival in 2013 gubernatorial election, says Democrats who did not support her are regretting it, now that he is in hot water over George Washington Bridge scandal; she has gone from media pinata, Democratic pariah and Keystone Candidate to the Cassandra of the Christie scandal, whose October warnings about lane closings went unheeded by most fellow Democrats.
lead_paragraph: Now that Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is in hot water over the bridge scandal, Barbara Buono, his rival in the 2013 election, said Democrats who didn’t support her are regretting it.

headline.main: Democrats Have Christie ‘Buyer’s Remorse,’ Buono Says
headline.print_headline: Democrats Have Christie ‘Buyer’s Remorse,’ Buono Says
